faq.title: FAQs at your disposal
faq.subtitle:
Got any questions?
Find the answers down below or contact us!
faq.concierge: Our Eyewear Concierge service is at your complete disposal. Write us to clarify any doubt and find your extraordinary eyewear!
faq.products.0.title: Product authenticity
faq.products.0.description: sunglassesandframes only deals with original products, purchased from the brands. With every order you’ll receive a certificate of authenticity.
faq.products.1.title: Warranty
faq.products.1.description: All our products are two years guaranteed from the day of purchase against defects in materials or workmanship.
faq.products.2.title: Availability
faq.products.2.description: All products on sunglassesandframes.vision are available in our warehouse and ready for dispatch. Our system updates in real time their availability both online and in store.
faq.payments.0.title: Methods
faq.payments.0.description:
We accepts payments through credit card (American Express, Maestro, Mastercard, Visa), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, Bancontact and iDeal.
UWe only use safe and encrypted services. In most cases, the total amount will be charged immediately. Otherwise, our customer service will contact you through email to fix the issue.
faq.payments.2.title: Personal datas
faq.payments.2.description: We only work with the safest online methods worldwide. With sunglassesandframes, the customers’ sensitive datas are 100% safe.
faq.shipping.0.title: Order processing
faq.shipping.0.description:
All orders from Monday to Friday are dispatched the same day. We ship through express delivery, which takes 24 hours for UE residents and 3 business days for the rest of the world. 
A Please note that due to Covid-19 delivery can take longer.
faq.shipping.1.title: Destinations
faq.shipping.2.title: Tracking
faq.shipping.2.description: It is possible to track the parcel through the code provided in the shipping confirmation/order placed e-mail.
faq.returns.0.title: Return policy
faq.returns.0.description: It is possible to return the goods within 30 days from the date of order. The product must be in the original box without any signs of usage.
faq.returns.1.title: Modalità
faq.returns.1.description: In order to organize a return, please visit our return policy page or drop us a line through our contact form.
faq.returns.2.title: Refunds
faq.returns.2.description: Refunds are automatically sent to the payment service used while ordering. The procedure takes up to 3 business days.
services.title: sunglassesandframes – Services
services.visit.title: Eye test
services.visit.description: In sunglassesandframes you will find the most advanced optical technologies for a complete and meticulous eye test.
services.rebalance.title: Frame tune up
services.rebalance.description: If your frames need a fix, we can do it for you. We will restore it to the best condition possible.
services.assembly.title: Express lenses customization
services.assembly.description: Our specialized team ensure express lenses customization for the most common issues.
